findings.name: unnecessary-checked-arithmetic-in-loop
findings.message: hecked-arithmetic-in-loop A lot of times there is no risk that the loop counter can overflow. Using Solidity's unchecked block saves the overflow checks. Details: https://sg.run/OvDk

findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
findings.message: quire Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec. Details: https://sg.run/ej3L

findings.name: use-prefix-increment-not-postfix
findings.message: t-not-postfix Consider using the prefix increment expression whenever the return value is not needed. The prefix increment expression is cheaper in terms of gas. Details: https://sg.run/nxLr
